nodes.text: Chun was an individual who formulated Chun's Theory of Reductional Infinity. The theory had not been solved by 20 BBY. During that year, the underemployed protocol droid I-5YQ considered using the free space of his cognitive module in solving the formula.
Chun and the theory were first mentioned in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel of the MedStar Duology. Battle Surgeons was written by Steve Perry and Michael Reaves, and published in 2004.
